home.intro: I build clear and functional interfaces. I connect design and development to create web products with intention, detail, and solid user experience.

skills.2: UI integration and smooth user experience

stack.title: Stack
stack.intro: I work with modern technologies to turn ideas into functional products. Choosing the right tools creates order; iteration makes them better.

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.description: Reactive UIs with TypeScript. React, Svelte, and Angular for dynamic interfaces. Vite for fast environments. Three.js, Motion, and GSAP for interactive experiences.

backend.title: Backend
backend.description: Solid API development with Java and Spring Boot, focused on modular architecture, security, and scalability.

data.title: Data & DevOps
data.description: MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and MySQL depending on project needs. Version control with Git and deployments using Docker.

design.title: Design
design.description: I use Figma for prototyping, design systems, and defining consistent user flows.

notFound.title: The link failed. The design didn’t.
notFound.description: Even poorly defined routes can teach us something.

footer.title: Let’s build something amazing together
footer.paragraph: I’m open to collab, and build ideas where technical detail and design vision truly matter.
